import React from "react"; import "../Styles/about.css"; import myphoto from "../Images/myphoto.png"; import SaiHimaSindhu_Resume from "../files/SaiHimaSindhu_Resume.pdf"; const About = ({ ref, func }) => { const handleDownload = () => { window.open( "https://drive.google.com/file/d/1iFKl8D8fLdu5b3Kl2GhUMAds6DrR6bWV/view?usp=sharing" ); const link = document.createElement("a"); link.href = SaiHimaSindhu_Resume; link.setAttribute("download", "SaiHimaSindhu_Resume.pdf"); link.setAttribute("id", "resume-link-2"); document.body.appendChild(link); link.click(); document.body.removeChild(link); }; return (

About Me

Aspiring Software Engineer with strong foundations in Python, JavaScript, SQL, and object-oriented programming. Experienced in developing logic-based and web applications through academic projects, with a solid understanding of functions and core programming concepts. Passionate about building efficient, user-focused software solutions and continuously enhancing technical expertise.

); }; export default About;
